select_is_poly:
@[is_poly]
theorem select_is_poly (P : â„• â†’ Prop) : is_poly p fun R _Rcr x => select P x :=
  by
  use select_poly P
  rintro R _Rcr x
  funext i
  apply coeff_select
#align select_is_poly select_is_poly
select_add_select_not:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprğ• -/
theorem select_add_select_not : âˆ€ x : (exprğ•) R, select P x + select (fun i => Â¬P i) x = x :=
  by
  ghost_calc _
  intro n
  simp only [RingHom.map_add]
  suffices
    (bindâ‚ (select_poly P)) (witt_polynomial p â„¤ n) + (bindâ‚ (select_poly fun i => Â¬P i)) (witt_polynomial p â„¤ n) =
      witt_polynomial p â„¤ n
    by
    apply_fun aeval x.coeff  at this
    simpa only [alg_hom.map_add, aeval_bindâ‚, â† coeff_select]
  simp only [witt_polynomial_eq_sum_C_mul_X_pow, select_poly, alg_hom.map_sum, alg_hom.map_pow, alg_hom.map_mul,
    bindâ‚_X_right, bindâ‚_C_right, â† finset.sum_add_distrib, â† mul_add]
  apply finset.sum_congr rfl
  refine' fun m hm => mul_eq_mul_left_iff.mpr (or.inl _)
  rw [ite_pow, ite_pow, zero_pow (pow_pos hp.out.pos _)]
  by_cases Pm : P m
  Â· rw [if_pos Pm, if_neg _, add_zero]
    exact not_not.mpr Pm
  Â· rwa [if_neg Pm, if_pos, zero_add]
#align select_add_select_not select_add_select_not
init_zsmul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprğ• -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `Â«expr â€¢ Â» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `Â«expr â€¢ Â» -/
theorem init_zsmul (m : â„¤) (x : (exprğ•) R) (n : â„•) : init n (Â«expr â€¢ Â» m x) = init n (Â«expr â€¢ Â» m (init n x)) := by
  init_ring using fun p [fact (Nat.Prime p)] n => witt_zsmul_vars p m n
#align init_zsmul init_zsmul

theorem init_sub (x y : (exprğ•) R) (n : â„•) : init n (x - y) = init n (init n x - init n y) := by

theorem init_neg (x : (exprğ•) R) (n : â„•) : init n (-x) = init n (-init n x) := by init_ring using witt_neg_vars

init_is_poly:
/-- `witt_vector.init n x` is polynomial in the coefficients of `x`. -/
theorem init_is_poly (n : â„•) : is_poly p fun R _Rcr => init n :=
  select_is_poly fun i => i < n
#align init_is_poly init_is_poly
init_init:

@[simp]
theorem init_init (x : (exprğ•) R) (n : â„•) : init n (init n x) = init n x := by init_ring
#align init_init init_init
init_add_tail:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprğ• -/
@[simp]
theorem init_add_tail (x : (exprğ•) R) (n : â„•) : init n x + tail n x = x := by
  simp only [init, tail, â† not_lt, select_add_select_not]
#align init_add_tail init_add_tail
init_add:

theorem init_add (x y : (exprğ•) R) (n : â„•) : init n (x + y) = init n (init n x + init n y) := by
  init_ring using witt_add_vars
#align init_add init_add
coeff_select:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprğ• -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Johan Commelin, Robert Y. Lewis
-/
-- type as `\bbW`
theorem coeff_select (x : (exprğ•) R) (n : â„•) : (select P x).coeff n = aeval x.coeff (select_poly P n) :=
  by
  dsimp [select, select_poly]
  split_ifs with hi
  Â· rw [aeval_X]
  Â· rw [alg_hom.map_zero]
#align coeff_select coeff_select
coeff_add_of_disjoint:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprğ• -/
theorem coeff_add_of_disjoint (x y : (exprğ•) R) (h : âˆ€ n, x.coeff n = 0 âˆ¨ y.coeff n = 0) :
    (x + y).coeff n = x.coeff n + y.coeff n :=
  by
  let P : â„• â†’ Prop := fun n => y.coeff n = 0
  haveI : decidable_pred P := classical.dec_pred P
  set z := mk p fun n => if P n then x.coeff n else y.coeff n with hz
  have hx : select P z = x := by
    ext1 n
    rw [select, coeff_mk, coeff_mk]
    split_ifs with hn
    Â· rfl
    Â· rw [(h n).resolve_right hn]
  have hy : select (fun i => Â¬P i) z = y := by
    ext1 n
    rw [select, coeff_mk, coeff_mk]
    split_ifs with hn
    Â· exact hn.symm
    Â· rfl
  calc
    (x + y).coeff n = z.coeff n := by rw [â† hx, â† hy, select_add_select_not P z]
    _ = x.coeff n + y.coeff n := _
    
  dsimp [z]
  split_ifs with hn
  Â· dsimp [P] at hn
    rw [hn, add_zero]
  Â· rw [(h n).resolve_right hn, zero_add]
#align coeff_add_of_disjoint coeff_add_of_disjoint
